languages.text: "Занятные новости о судьбе моего кабала. Впрочем, более чем ожидаемые".
"Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."
languages.original_text: "Занятные новости о судьбе моего кабала. Впрочем, более чем ожидаемые".

traits.locale_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."
"Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."
"Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."
"Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

languages.text: “这还真是个有趣的消息，关乎我的阴谋团。这比我预想得还要有趣。”
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

traits.locale_text: “这还真是个有趣的消息，关乎我的阴谋团。这比我预想得还要有趣。”

languages.text: «Son noticias intrigantes sobre el destino de mi Kábala. Mucho más de lo que esperaba».
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

traits.locale_text: «Son noticias intrigantes sobre el destino de mi Kábala. Mucho más de lo que esperaba».

languages.text: 「我が陰謀団の運命に関する面白い報せだ。想像以上にな」
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

traits.locale_text: 「我が陰謀団の運命に関する面白い報せだ。想像以上にな」

languages.text: « J'avoue être intrigué par ces nouvelles de ma Kabale, bien plus que je ne l'aurais imaginé. »
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

traits.locale_text: « J'avoue être intrigué par ces nouvelles de ma Kabale, bien plus que je ne l'aurais imaginé. »

languages.text: "Interessante Neuigkeiten, was das Schicksal meiner Kabale angeht. Interessanter als erwartet."
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."

traits.locale_text: "Interessante Neuigkeiten, was das Schicksal meiner Kabale angeht. Interessanter als erwartet."

languages.text: "Kabalımın akıbetine ilişkin bu haberler çok ilginç. Fazlasıyla."
languages.original_text: "Intriguing news about the fate of my Kabal. More so than expected."
